text: Logaščica Creek is a stream that flows across the Logatec Karst Field and collects water from the western dolomite area of the karst field. Logaščica Creek starts at the confluence of Reka Ceek and Black Creek () in Gorenji Logatec and it sinks into the walled Jačka Sinkhole.Breg Valjavec, Mateja. 2013. Nekdanja odlagališča odpadkov v vrtačah in gramoznicah (= Geografija Slovenije 26). Ljubljana: SAZU, p. 37. The stream often floods. After it flows into the ground, it joins water from the Planina Karst Field () and drains below the Logatec Karst Field towards Močilnik Springs and other sources of the Ljubljanica in Vrhnika. == References == ==External links== *Logaščica Creek on Geopedija Category:Sinking rivers Category:Municipality of Logatec Category:Rivers of Inner Carniola
title: Logaščica
